title: Young Knives - Voices Of Animals And Men
description:
Voices of Animals and Men is the first full-length album by Young Knives, released on August 22, 2006. The album&#039;s title is a reference to the Adam & the Ants song "Animals and Men". The cover features a figure made of straw, a reference to the Whittlesey Straw Bear Festival.

The album was nominated for the 2007 Mercury Music Prize.

   1. "Part Timer" ? 2:54
   2. "The Decision" ? 3:23
   3. "Weekends and Bleak Days (Hot Summer)" ? 2:47
   4. "In the Pink" ? 3:16
   5. "Mystic Energy" ? 2:52
   6. "Here Comes the Rumour Mill" ? 3:34
   7. "Tailors" ? 4:11
   8. "Half Timer" ? 1:39
   9. "She&#039;s Attracted To" ? 3:06
  10. "Dialing Darling" ? 2:59
  11. "Another Hollow Line" ? 3:42
  12. "Coastguard" ? 3:01
  13. "Loughborough Suicide" ? 3:56
  14. "Tremblings of Trails" ? 3:21
